FILE: cm750775v11.0.txt
DYAD: INDIA - BURMA/MYANMAR
RIVALRY: RIV1341
DISPUTE(S): MID2025 

PSNOTES: 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20190309
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20190309

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID2025

TERRMID: MID2025 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID2025 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2025 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2025 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2025 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2025 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2025 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2025 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2025 1 -- civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2025 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID2025 from Gibler 2018, in 1957 India was pursuing militarized rebels and occupied part of Burmese territory to attack the rebels who had crossed the border there. Coded civil war MID because this was connected to militraized rebels in India and Burma. 

CIVWARLINK: MID2025 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2025 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2025 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2025 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2025 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2025 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 


MID4565

TERRMID: MID4565 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID4565 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4565 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4565 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4565 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4565 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID4565 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4565 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4565 1 -- civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4565 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID4565 from Gibler 2018, in 2004 militarized rebels in Myanmar killed an Indian soldier on the border, and India put its forces on alert in response. Coded civil war MID because this was connected to militarzied rebel activity in Myanmar. 

CIVWARLINK: MID4565 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4565 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4565 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4565 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4565 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4565 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID4 2002-2010:

MID4565
rivalry=750775 nationa=INDIA nationb=BURMA/MYANMAR MID4565 20041213-20041213 
 revtype1a=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=DISPLAY OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE
fatalpb=0 lhostb=NO MILITARIZED ACTION 

India placed its troops on the Myanmar border on alert after Burmese rebels shot and killed an Indian officer. First day of dispute was on 12/13/2004 and last day of dispute was on 12/13/2004.

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

SOURCES-CM:

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
